channel.title: Coding with Y{o}u
channel.description: A history of my thoughts and activities in software development.

item.title: A New Teleological Society
item.author: Daniel Yu
item.description: When most people think of cybernetics today, imagery of artificial limbs and other tropes from sci-fi probably come to mind first. In reality, cybernetics is a huge field spanning a vast array of disciplines. But what exactly is cybernetics, and what can it tell us about the world we live in and the issues we face on an individual, societal, and global scale?

item.title: An AWK-ward primer
item.author: Daniel Yu
item.description: My first blog post! If you're a fan of old languages, or if you just want to write fast scripts that can easily parse text files, then learning AWK might be for you.
